Contact Details: Author: Community and Mental Health Team, NHS Digital Responsible Statistician: Tom Poupart Telephone: 0300 303 5678 Email: enquiries@nhsdigital.nhs.uk
Description: This publication brings together the LDA data from the Assuring Transformation collection and the LDA service specific statistics from the Mental Health Statistics Data Set (MHSDS).
Name: Learning Disability Services Monthly Statistics
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by clicking on the link under 'Latest version' 7 CSV files and 3 XLS files are located under Resources.    A link to  Metadata is located below the resources section.  Scroll 1/2 way down the page and the top link 'MHSDS monthly metadata' will open the metadata file.
Sizing Notes: Simple table structures. Large CSV file with simple dimensions. XLS with additional dimensions, subdimensions and footnotes.
